ACTION REPORT

September 19, 2000

Items being done this month:

  1. The complete rekeying of the property is now completed.

  2. The parking lot resurfacing is being done now and will be finished by the end of the month.

  3. Bids are in your hands regarding the roof repairs/replacement.

Items to be done next month:

  1. By the Board meeting the bids should be in regarding stripping and cleaning the entry tiles.

  2. Tile bids are also hard to get but we are still working on it.

  3. Bids will be coming in regarding the final trimming and removal of trees.

  4. The roof on the south buildings to be replaced and the north repaired.

Items being done by maintenance:

  1. We have started sorting and organizing the storage areas.

  2. The garbage area’s and dumpsters are being cleaned, one at a time.

    3.

Items completed last month:

  1. We still need another nite-staff person.

  2. The rekeying of the property is finished.

  3. We are now doing the Condo/financing packs in house. We have done two at this time.

  4. Fountains have been rebuilt.

  5. Carpets have been cleaned.
